title: Deep Spatio-Temporal Architectures and Learning for Protein Structure Prediction

author: Ken Nagata, Institute for Genomics and Bioinformatics, University of California

segmentation: So I'd like to talk about the deep architecture for potential prediction today.

So there are three steps to predict the 3D structure from the primary sequence sequence.
